name: Volumizing Shampoo for Fine, Dry, Thinning Hair
about: What it is: A weightless volumizing shampoo that plumps strands from root to ends for fuller-looking hair with fenugreek seed for fine to medium hair types..Hair Texture: Straight, Wavy, and Curly..Hair Type: Fine and Medium..Hair Concerns:- Shine.- Thinning.- Volumizing..Key Benefits: - Plumps strands for fuller-looking hair.- Gives weightless volume at the roots.- Cleanses the hair and scalp without stripping away natural oils and moisture..Highlighted Ingredients:- Fenugreek Seed: Plumps strands and adds volume while promoting a healthy scalp..- Onion Juice: Promotes healthy hair growth and strengthens strands for less breakage..- Amla Extract: Conditions hair and naturally provides UV protection for healthy strands...Ingredient Callouts: This product is vegan and cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: Enriched with potent Ayurvedic ingredients, fenugreek seeds for body and fullness and shine-boosting amla, this weightless shampoo plumps strands while cleansing the hair and scalp without stripping away natural moisture, for a soft, hydrated and voluminous mane...Fragrance Description: This volumizing shampoo has a majestically warm spice blend of Indian saffron and nutmeg, paired with midnight rose Damascena and Indian jasmine sambac, with a touch of incense and sandalwood for an unexpected richness and depth...Clinical Results: Based on 33 participants using the Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner for 2 weeks:.- 100% said they saw all-over fullness.- 97% agree it enhances fullness and volume.- 97% said it cleanses without drying hair and scalp.-  91% saw instant weightless volume..Clean at Sephora: Our commitment to offering formulas that go beyond regulatory standards to avoid controversial ingredients without sacrificing effectiveness.
ingredients: -Fenugreek Seed: Plumps strands and adds volume while promoting a healthy scalp. .-Onion Juice: Promotes healthy hair growth and strengthens strands for less breakage. .-Amla Extract: Conditions hair and naturally provides UV protection for healthy strands...Water (Aqua), Decyl Glucoside, Lauryl Glucoside, Glycerin, Sodium Cocoyl Isethionate, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Coco-Glucoside, Disodium Coco-Glucoside Citrate, Hydrolyzed Adansonia Digitata Seed Protein, Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract, Yucca Schidigera Extract, Amaranthus Caudatus Seed Extract, Allium Cepa (Onion) Bulb Extract, Trigonella Foenum-Graecum Seed Extract, Withania Somnifera Root Extract, Nigella Sativa Seed Extract, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Lactobacillus Ferment, Glyceryl Oleate, Diheptyl Succinate, Capryloyl Glycerin/Sebacic Acid Copolymer, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Guar Hydroxypropyltrimonium Chloride, Fragrance, Phenoxyethanol, Gluconolactone, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid...The list of ingredients is subject to change. Please consult the packaging of the product purchased.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.- Wet hair and lather in at least three pumps of product..- Massage from root to tip and breathe deeply..- Rinse and gently squeeze out excess water, then apply Volumizing Conditioner (sold separately).

reviews.review_text: I recently tried the new Fable and Mane Volumizing Shampoo and Conditioner, and Iu2019m thrilled with the results. As I massaged it from roots to ends, I noticed it cleansed my hair thoroughly without leaving it dry or stripped of its natural moisture. The fenugreek seeds and amla extracts worked wonders, giving my hair a noticeable body and shine after just one wash. The Volumizing Conditioner was equally impressive. After rinsing out the shampoo, I applied the conditioner from mid-lengths to ends, as suggested. The black seed extract and amla made my hair feel incredibly soft and bouncy. I waited for a minute before rinsing, and the difference was remarkable. My hair felt fuller, more elastic, and had a lovely shine that lasted all day. Overall, this Fable and Mane duo is a game-changer for anyone looking to add volume and shine to their hair. The Ayurvedic ingredients make it a high-performance, silicone-free option that leaves your hair feeling rejuvenated and full of life.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: For reference, I have fine, medium-density 2b hair and this worked really well for me! I tried it on a blow-dry day, a wavy airdry day, and a lazy day where I just let my hair dry without product after and liked the outcome on all days. I do have a few notes to share on it.   I don't think this is a volumizing shampoo. To me, it performs more like a thickening shampoo.  My hair feels PLUMP and thick after, not like a traditional volumizing shampoo that leaves hair super cleansed and bouncy. This left my hair feeling moisturized, like I could skip shampoo.   The shampoo has a really low lather, very small bubbles, kinda feels velvetty when you lather in your hair. I definitely needed three pumps to wash my longer the shoulders hair. Speaking of pumps, the pumps are very hard to press down with one hand, I wish they pumped a bit more easily and it makes me think it's not the best packaging for the formula.   I love the scent, and as someone where scent doesn't stick to my hair well, I felt like I could smell it in my hair after I styled which means whatever fragrance they use it high-quality.   Overall, I really like this shampoo and would repurchase it! It makes me want to try other products from Fable and Mane.

My hair type is fine and tends to be a bit flat, especially at the roots. I always look for products that can add some volume without weighing my hair down or making it greasy.  Upon using the Fable and Mane Volumizing Shampoo, I noticed how rich and creamy the lather was. It felt nourishing but not heavy, and it spread easily through my hair. After rinsing, my hair felt clean but not stripped of its natural oils.  Once my hair dried, it felt noticeably lighter and fuller. There was a definite lift at the roots, and my hair had a natural, healthy shine. The volume lasted throughout the day, and my hair remained soft and manageable.  Overall, the Fable and Mane Volumizing Shampoo exceeded my expectations. It provided a good amount of volume, left my hair feeling clean and healthy, and had a pleasant scent that lingered subtly. I would highly recommend it to anyone with fine hair looking for a bit more lift and fullness.

reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this shampoo and conditioner. My hair is thanking the brand for making this product. I use it 2 a week to wash my wavy hair and it makes my hair so voluminous and soft. Thank you Fable and main for making such a rocking product !

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have fine, thin, long hair and was thrilled to try the Fable and Mane haircare line. After using it for a week, my hair has become incredibly soft and smooth. The fenugreek leaves in the product have smoothed my split ends and cleansed my scalp. My hair looks healthy and voluminous without feeling weighed down.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This shampoo is hydrating. My hair is very dry and brittle and usually shampoos can be too harsh but this one is not at all. It adds the right amount of hydration and volume. I canu2019t wait to continue using this and see the progress my hair makes

reviews.review_title: I Get The Hype Of This Brand!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the scent of this shampoo and its consistency. It lathers well and feels like it's good at removing build-up on my scalp for more hydrated and well-nourished hair. The ayurvedic scent is lovely and this also helps make my hair look fuller and bouncier, especially when it's humid outside. So far, I'm very impressed.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was pleasantly surprised by these. they did a nice job on my hair. obviously I havenu2019t seen long term results since they just released, but so far I am very pleased by how this treated my hair. sent by fable and mane

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: My hair gets greasy super fast (like the very next day) so I really needed a volumizing shampoo that works and this does help prolong the volume in my roots for an extra day or two. I love the fenugreek scent and the ayurvedic ingredients that are known for strengthening hair.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Combination of these two is amazing. I have been using this over a year now and itu2019s my best shampoo and conditioner that I have ever used. Love love the how the scent is plus it helps my hair to grow.
